greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(0,0)=1; T(m,0)=0; otherwise T(m,n) = (m-1)*T(m-1,n)+(m-1+n)*T(m-1,n-1).
comment: If the first column is omitted we get A075856, which has much more information about this triangle.
reference: P. W. Shor, Problem 78-6: A combinatorial identity, in Problems and Solutions column, SIAM Review; problem in 20, p. 394 (1978); solution in 21, pp. 258-260 (1979).
maple: for m from 0 to M do
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 23 2014
